name: Hammer carnival button clicker
description:
Clicker game of reflexes and speed with hammer carnival machine. Test your reflexes and speed of your fingers and mind in this exciting game clicker.
Challenge your friends, you get the highest level.
Simply click very fast on the button machine hammer, until the end and ring the bell.
The level of difficulty increases in each game. There are many clicker games but none as original.
There are infinite levels. Who will be the fastest?

BENEFITS
* Remember use two fingers
* Machine hammer carnival and realistic lighting effects
* Includes machine divining the future with clown laughs
* Totally free game
* Special to relieve stress and make competitions between friends
* Do not go to the toilet without this game!
